body_html: Have not tried tried this for some time but it used to work. Should still work because ops like gru use the same mechanism. I can take a look ... might take me a few days to get to it. For debug builds: they are broken a lot. I use RelWithDebInfo which has only the problem that combined pdb for the tensorflow.dll is >4GB which the linker fails on. My workaround is to delete some of the pdb's I don't care about before linking.

body: Have not tried tried this for some time but it used to work. Should still work because ops like gru use the same mechanism. I can take a look ... might take me a few days to get to it. For debug builds: they are broken a lot. I use RelWithDebInfo which has only the problem that combined pdb for the tensorflow.dll is >4GB which the linker fails on. My workaround is to delete some of the pdb's I don't care about before linking.
